content: This is Red. While we have had positive relations in the past, your unprovoked invasion of Purple raises serious concerns. We strongly recommend ceasing hostilities and opening dialogue to find a peaceful resolution.
This is Red. We are troubled by Orange's invasion of your country. Please inform us if there is any diplomatic assistance we can provide to help de-escalate this conflict.
This is Red. Orange's invasion of Purple is alarming. We should coordinate diplomacy to encourage de-escalation and discourage further aggression.
Red strongly condemns Orange's unprovoked invasion of Purple. This aggression jeopardizes regional stability and violates international norms. We call on Orange to cease hostilities immediately.
Red offers its full support and assistance to help Purple respond to Orange's unwarranted aggression. Please inform us of any diplomatic or material support we can provide.
Red proposes coordinating our diplomatic efforts to condemn Orange's actions and encourage de-escalation. Let's work together for regional stability.
Red strongly condemns Orange's continued aggression against Purple. This invasion violates international norms and must cease immediately.
Orange, further military action will only escalate this crisis. Let us open urgent diplomatic channels to find a peaceful resolution that addresses your concerns.
Red remains fully committed to providing diplomatic assistance to help resolve Orange's invasion. Please inform us if there are any other ways we can help de-escalate the situation.
